backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles and per‑user health logs with access control and CRUD query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing major frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing between pages, managing auth, profile loading, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation buttons, and auth controls that adapt to signed‑in state.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading handling and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/HealthLogCompose: Form component for submitting mood, sleep hours, and notes to create a health log entry.
frontend/src/components/HealthLogList.ts: Displays recent health log entries with mood, sleep, notes, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, age range, and health goals, submitting via a save-profile hook.
frontend/src/components/SignedInBadge.ts: Shows a badge with the user’s name or shortened principal when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthLog.ts: Hooks to fetch and create health log entries using the actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks for loading and saving the current user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with profile editing, health log creation, and log list display using various UI components and hooks.
Displays a coming-soon page outlining planned AI wellness insight features with informational cards and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the marketing landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation buttons to dashboard or insights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the VitaSense project state, including schema version, planned features, image requirements, and current UI/UX and backend capability goals. Lists all existing feature definitions and their requirement IDs for build planning.
